author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

As per AlCa/DB request a bunch of Pixel Bad FED Channel simulation related plugins are moved from `CondFormats/SiPixelObjects` to `CondTools/SiPixel`.
I profit of the PR to fix a small bug in `FastSiPixelFEDChannelContainerFromQuality` and to apply code-formatting.
The moved plugins are now tested in unit tests.

#### PR validation:

Relies on existing unit tests.
Run `scram b runtests`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Move Pixel Bad FED Channel simulation related plugins to `CondTools`
